definition: Lin Chong, one of the Heroes of the Marsh in Water Margin
surname Lin/Japanese surname Hayashi
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: Lin Ch'ung stayed with Ch'ai Chin in the village for several days and was entertained by Ch'ai Chin every day.
sentences.chinese: 柴進留林沖在莊上一連住了幾日，每日好酒好食相待。

sentences.english: The snowstorm was so terrible that I had to share an umbrella with Lin.
sentences.chinese: 暴風雪很可怕，我只能和林沖合用一把傘了。

sentences.english: Lin Chong is one of successfully described figures in Outlaws of the Marsh .
sentences.chinese: 林沖是《水滸傳》中塑造較爲成功的人物之一。

sentences.english: Lin Ch'ung put his pack and quilt on the bed and sat there by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 林沖就牀上放了包裹被臥，坐下生些焰火起來。

sentences.english: Lin Chong and Lu Zhishen were sworn brothers.
sentences.chinese: 林沖和魯智深是結拜兄弟。

sentences.english: As well, the paper described the treatment proposal for tailings dam closing in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細敘述了林沖尾礦庫閉庫治理流程。

sentences.english: Lin Ch'ung felt faint and still could hardly walk.
sentences.chinese: 林沖起來，暈了，喫不得，又走不動。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is vital to examine the management of the commercial forest conflict.
sentences.chinese: 因此，對商品林沖突管理進行研究就顯得尤爲重要。

sentences.english: He acted Lin Chong in the Beijing opera Driven to Join the Liangshan Rebels.
sentences.chinese: 他在京劇《逼上梁山》裏去林沖。

sentences.english: Lin Chong left home for Liang Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 林沖離開家到梁山去了。

definition: famous Song dynasty family of warriors (c. 10th century AD), resisted the Liao 遼|辽 and defended the Song/the subject of the popular fiction Yang Saga 楊家將|杨家将
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
Kaesong or Gaeseong city in southwest North Korea, close to the border with South Korea and a special economic zone for South Korean companies
Wu Yong, character of 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], nicknamed Resourceful Star 智多星[Zhi4 duo1 xing1]
venturing from one's thatched hut for the first time (idiom)/young and inexperienced/novice/greenhorn
Lien Chan (1936-), Taiwanese politician, former vice-president and chairman of Guomintang
to go on a punitive expedition
to sacrifice one's life
Yang Saga, a popular fiction from the Northern Song, depicting the heroic Yang family 楊業|杨业 of warriors
brigand
Liu Bei's five great generals in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, namely: Guan Yu 關羽|关羽, Zhang Fei 張飛|张飞, Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云, Ma Chao 馬超|马超, Huang Zhong 黃忠|黄忠
volunteer army
ambush/to ambush
Ximen Qing, character from 金瓶梅[Jin1 ping2 mei2] and 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4]
imperial guard
Wei State (407-225 BC), one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Wei State or Cao Wei 曹魏 (220-265), the most powerful of the Three Kingdoms
